channel.title: Good SCAR Scripters
channel.description: I'm just curious as to who the good SCAR Scripters these days are? Last time I was scripting I was competing with Phalanx, and GothKing5000 whom I know in real life. That was back on RSCN, in 03-04, and when I was admin of Reinet. Also, are there any great SCAR Autofighters out? I plan on making one, just released a 2 hour beta of an RS2 Fighter in the scripts section.

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Bumis:

and he kept bringing it back, until he sold the source too some dicks.

Cough Raw aka Josh Cough

Read full topic

@WT-Fakawi wrote:

Well well. What do I see. I click on an old thread and look: “It’s me!” VG-Cobra… I am flattered. Enough reason to Bump this one

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

Fakawi, The best scripter. One of my personal favorites are his Goblin/Jailguard Trainer and his Rimmy Miner. Flawless, I can gain 30 levels in 12 hours and mine 2k Iron in 6 hours although he didn't update it for the new mines yet

Anyways I induct Fakawi into the Hall of Fame of Scripters

Read full topic

Canadarules is actually a good friend of mine. I know him in real life. He goes to my school, and is in 2 of my classes!

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

Heh. I know GothKing5000 in real life, known him sence I was about 5. But no, Kaitnieks didn't run RSCN, it was Mediator, and it was http://www.rscheatnet.com Dylock, EvilCowGod and Kait admined with him. Evilcowgod was the one who origonally made RS cheating big, with Evilcowgod.com and Bovinelabs.com, that was a long time ago although. Early 2001, when Evilcowgod came out of no where.

And Kait showed up out of no where, posting about his "Big Project", which was Autorune, the first scriptable bot. No one believed what he had to say at first, until some people tried it and were amazed. Jagex just kept screwing AR up with updates, and he kept bringing it back, until he sold the source too some dicks. Then he made SCAR.

Read full topic

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Bumis:

I'm just curious as to who the good SCAR Scripters these days are? Last time I was scripting I was competing with Phalanx, and GothKing5000 whom I know in real life. That was back on RSCN, in 03-04, and when I was admin of Reinet. Also, are there any great SCAR Autofighters out? I plan on making one, just released a 2 hour beta of an RS2 Fighter in the scripts section.

Nice to hear you Bumis2k4ld (or something like that) are back. I remember Phalanx, in my opinion his map angle fix was amazing (probably because i was a noob back then). GothKing5000 started the form boom :D. If im not mistaken he made a good guildminer, which was almost as good as evil44's, and a woodchopper which i never tried.

Werent you Bumis working on an autofighter?

For 'noob', Mediator owned RSCN, not Odie.

Good old times :).

Read full topic

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

thechezman14:

stupiid3ooo

He was a good scripter, in some sort.

At least his scripts worked well, but they were not exactly written properly, many of his procedures were detectable, plus he doesnt update his scripts anymore, and I havn't heard anything good about this scripts that cost money.

Read full topic

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

noob:

[quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=361.msg4216#msg4216 date=1142698982]
[quote author=noob link=topic=361.msg4004#msg4004 date=1142618390]
Well, isnt scar pretty dead, when aryan came jagex realesed like 5 randoms that were too hard to solve for scar, am i rite? You cant auto if the script gets fucked up when a random comes up, randoms comes regulary these days.

But i dont say scar sucks, i was using it before aryan and i was near lerning it.

When you say rscn, do you mean odies old forum, cuz i rembered them, they rocked tottaly.
Do you rember a scar scipter named canadarules? I really liked that guy, i thought he was best.

If aryan was never released, I doubt half the new randoms would be in place. Scar will never die, only scripters. When he says rscn, he means the forums before kaitnieks, since I wasn't around that long they don't pop straght into my head.
[/quote]

Do you mean the forums that were on kaitnieks.com, cuz i rember RSCN was odies site.[/quote]

Whaa? RSCN wasn't Odie's site.

And I agree with Pyro - the SRL folks are the best and brightest of the SCAR scripting crowd.

Read full topic

@Pyro wrote:

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

noob:

Well, isnt scar pretty dead, when are came jagex realesed like 5 randoms that were too hard to solve for scar, am i rite? You cant auto if the script gets fucked up when a random comes up, randoms comes regulary these days.

But i dont say scar sucks, i was using it before aryan and i was near lerning it.

When you say rscn, do you mean odies old forum, cuz i rembered them, they rocked tottaly.
Do you rember a scar scipter named canadarules? I really liked that guy, i thought he was best.

CanadaRules was an amazing scripter, annd i learnt a lot of things from him. I still use some of his stuff
There are many great scripters around, check the SRL manual for the Top scripters:

"Developers are (in alphabetical order): Benland100, Benleegt, Flyboy, Kernel Klink, Liquid, Lorax, Masquerader, Mutant Squirrle, Renax, RsN, Sdcit, Starblaster100, Wizzup? and WT-Fakawi." Only the top get accepted as developers in to this community, so its a pretty good representation of who you are competing against

Read full topic

item.title: Good SCAR Scripters
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

If you are really that old then many things have changed. RSN is still here but most of the includes are dead. Now, there is an include called SRL made and contatined by excellent scripters. Now, great scripters are age 1- 42 (oldest i know )

there are many great scripters now including:

  1. WT-Fakawi
  2. RSN
  3. Renax
  4. Lorax
    5.Zup
  5. Starblaster
  6. etc

Read full topic
